definition: (dialect) to rub one's hand along/to fire (an employee)/to reprimand
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
(bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]

sentences.english: How can you lose a man in 5 mins?
sentences.chinese: 如何在5分鐘內擼死一個男人？

sentences.english: Trust me, he's Mormon, those guys never wank.
sentences.chinese: 相信我，他是個摩門教徒，他們不會擼的。

sentences.english: Each blow, you'll find out that life is so beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 互擼一下，你會發現生活竟然是如此的美好。

sentences.english: Tilly drew her own leg up onto the chair and pulled up her pants leg.
sentences.chinese: 蒂莉把她自己的腿伸到椅子上，擼起褲腿。

sentences.english: Never blow your nose, burp, belch at and around the table.
sentences.chinese: 絕對不要在餐桌上或在餐桌旁擼鼻子或打飽嗝。

sentences.english: Its wretched kingdoms quake beneath my rage.
sentences.chinese: 可悲的王國在我的狂擼中崩潰。

sentences.english: MeiRi abides by a ZERO TOLERANCE policy relating to any illegal content.
sentences.chinese: 擼一夜視頻恪守與任何非法內容採取零容忍政策。

definition: original poster (in an online forum)/landlord of a building (traditional)
modal particle indicating indicating lack of enthusiasm/modal particle indicating that things should only or can only be done a certain way
to chant/see 梵唄|梵呗[fan4 bai4]
mythical horse/Internet slang for 什麼|什么[shen2 me5]
what are you doing?/whatever for?/why on earth?
Brothers!/brethren/dude (colloquial)/brother (diminutive form of address between males)
to take liberties with a woman/to dally/to assail a woman with obscenities
to play/to have fun/to hang out
to draw towards oneself/to gather/to gather up (one's gown, sleeves etc)/to grab (money)/to extort
to hug/to embrace/to hold in one's arms
